title: Fix remember-me option and add data refresh button

requirements.text: Fix the 'keep me logged in' functionality to properly persist client authentication sessions between browser sessions
acceptanceCriteria: When 'keep me logged in' is checked, client authentication persists after closing and reopening the browser
When unchecked, client authentication is cleared when browser is closed
The remember-me state is properly saved to localStorage when checked and sessionStorage when unchecked

requirements.text: Add a refresh button in the client dashboard that allows clients to manually reload their data when the administrator has modified their information

quotes: coloque um botão de recarregar para o cliente apertar caso o administrador tenha mudado seus dados e não tenha aparecido ainda

acceptanceCriteria: A refresh button is visible and accessible in the client dashboard interface
Clicking the button triggers a refetch of all client data from the backend
The button shows a loading state while data is being refreshed
After refresh completes, updated data (credentials, plan, expiry, VM status, etc.) is displayed immediately

constraints: Do not modify the useInternetIdentity.ts hook or other immutable frontend paths
Use existing React Query hooks for data fetching and mutation
Maintain the current authentication architecture with useClientAuth
nonGoals: Modifying admin authentication or remember-me functionality
Implementing automatic polling or real-time data sync
Adding refresh functionality to the admin panel
